summary: This is an email chain from November 4, 2020, discussing the progress of a vendor bates-stamping and exporting a large document production for the case US v. Epstein. The production is broken into seven parts, with parts 1-3 completed and part 4 about to start. The email notes the Florida documents are being handled separately.

events.title: Estimated completion of large document production
events.description: The vendor estimates the large production (excluding Florida documents) will be completed and copied to a drive by this date.

keyFacts: A vendor is processing a large document production for the case US v. Epstein, broken into seven parts.
As of November 4, 2020, parts 1-3 are finished bates-stamping, with part 4 about to start.
Parts 1 and 2 have been exported to a hard drive; part 3 finished stamping but export had not yet begun.
The Florida documents are being handled separately and are not included in this production estimate.
The document references specific production identifiers: EFTA00089733, SDNY_PROD015 - PART 01, PART 02, PART 03.
